oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Park grounds of Shelby Park, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the park grounds of Shelby Park. This large urban park is located approximately three miles east of downtown Nashville, Tennessee in East Nashville, along the Cumberland River. The Nashville Park Commission acquired the initial land, approx. 151 acres, for the park in 1909. The official opening was on July 4, 1912. Shelby Park is operated by Metropolitan Nashville Department of Parks and Recreation. Forms part of Metro Archives Record Group 327, Metro Parks and Recreation Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
